mapper.insert: INSERT INTO house_Contract (acc_year, ssg_code, ssg_name, dong_code, dong_name, land_kind, land_kind_name, bobn, bubn, floor, contract_date, rent_kind, rent_area, rent_deposit, rent_fee, building_name, build_year, house_kind_name, contract_period, new_ron_secd, address) VALUES (#{accYear}, #{ssgCode}, #{ssgName}, #{dongCode}, #{dongName}, #{landKind}, #{landKindName}, #{bobn}, #{bubn}, #{floor}, #{contractDate}, #{rentKind}, #{rentArea}, #{rentDeposit}, #{rentFee}, #{buildingName}, #{buildYear}, #{houseKindName}, #{contractPeriod}, #{newRonSecd}, #{address})
INSERT INTO houseContractScore(user_id, house_id, contract_score, place_score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{houseId}, #{contractScore}, #{placeScore})
mapper.select: SELECT house_id "houseId", building_name "buildingName", contract_date "contractDate", address "address", rent_kind "rentKind", rent_area "rentArea", rent_deposit "rentDeposit", rent_fee "rentFee", build_year "buildYear", house_kind_name "houseKindName", contract_period "contractPeriod", new_ron_secd "newRonSecd", contract_score "contractScore", place_score "placeScore" FROM house_Contract WHERE house_id = #{houseId}
